text.div:
NCDHC Consent Category

http://hl7.org.au/fhir/ch/v1/CodeSystem/ncdhc-consent-category-1

National Children Digital Health Collaborative - Consent Category - these will represent the consent status applicable to the creation and operation of the Child Digital Health Record and Digital Pregnancy Health Record initiatives for the National Digital Health Collaborative.

name: ncdhc-consent-category
title: NCDHC Consent Category
description: National Children Digital Health Collaborative -  Consent Category - these will represent the consent status applicable to the creation and operation of the Child Digital Health Record and Digital Pregnancy Health Record initiatives for the National Digital Health Collaborative.
copyright: Copyright Â© 2019 Australian Digital Health Agency - All rights reserved. This content is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License. See https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/.

concept.definition: Consent for the creation of a Child Health record on the birth of a child. This will be held against the person having the parental responsibility of the child at birth, typically the mother

concept.display: Digital Pregnancy Health Record Create Consent
concept.definition: Consent for the creation of a Digital Pregnancy Health Record

concept.display: Child Digital Health Record Operation Consent
concept.definition: Consent for a child to have a operative child digital health record

concept.display: Digital Pregnancy Health Record Operation Consent
concept.definition: Consent for the pregnant women to have a operative Digital Pregnancy Health Record

concept.display: Consent to Interact with My Health Record
concept.definition: Consent provided by the authorised representative to Interact with My Health Record
Consent used to record registration role and authorisation
